S08n671:1: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n671:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīye mūlakalpe aparamapi mudrā paramaguhyatamam |
S08n671:3: sarveṣāṃ mudrātantravidhānaṃ sarvamantrāṇāṃ sammataṃ sarvamantraiśca saha saṃyojya sarvakarmaprasādhakaṃ samyak sambodhimārgaviśodhakaṃ sarvabhavamārgavināśakaṃ sarvasattvopajīvyaṃ āyurārogyaiśvaryasarvāśāpāripūrakaṃ sarvabodhipakṣadharmaparipūrakaṃ sarvasattvasantoṣaṇakaraṃ sarvasattvamanāśābhirucitasaphalābhikaraṇaṃ sarvakarmakaraṃ sarvamantrānuprasādhakaṃ sarvamudrāmantrasametam |
S08n671:6: prasṛtasamohānobhayapāṇinā jihvā ānāmikāṅgulyau karamadhye nakhe nakhaṃ paridhāya aṅguṣṭhāgreṇopagūḍhāḥ kanyasau sūcyākāreṇa saṃhatāgrā tathaiva madhyamā samanakhaśikhāsaṃsaktamadhyagau pradeśinyau sūcyākārasamantāvabhāsoṣṇīṣamahālakṣaṇaṃ nāma mahāmudrā |
S08n671:7: bhavati cātra mantraḥ - āḥ maḥ haṃ |
S08n671:10: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om dhuna pātaya chinda cakre vajriṇi hūṃ samayiravo bhāge pradeśinyo nirgugugulyākātṛkaṃ caturmārāriśayanī |
S08n671:12: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om vajrānani hū phaṭ |
S08n671:13: paryak tu mudrā mantrā ca saṃyuktā sarvakarmasu |
S08n671:15: caturmārakṛtā ye ca ye ca vighnā sasurāsurāḥ |
S08n671:20: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om vijaye haḥ |
S08n671:22: ebhiranyatamairmudrai hastadvayenāvabadhvā sādhanakāle pūrvasevākāle vā sakṛduccārya yāvadicchaṃ japet niṣaṇṇo sthito vā |
S08n671:25: tā eva pradeśinyaḥ sañcārya madhyamayopari saṃsaktāgrāṃ kārayet |
S08n671:27: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om jvalojjvala dīptodgatoṣṇīṣa dhuna dhuna hū ||
S08n671:28: tā eva pradeśinyo sañcārya madhyamasūcyā sadā nakhaśikharasaṃsaktā nirbhugnagulphakuṇḍalākāramudrā sitātapatroṣṇīṣa |
S08n671:29: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - oṃ ma ma ma ma hūṃ niḥ ||
S08n671:30: tā eva pradeśinyau paratastulyamudyamya āśleṣya madhyamasūcye tejorāśimudrā |
S08n671:31: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - oṃ tathāgatoṣṇīṣa anavalokitamūrdhni tejorāśi hūṃ jvala jvala eka eka dara vidara cchinda bhinda hūṃ hūṃ sphaṭ sphaṭ svāhā ||
S08n671:33: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - oṃ jayoṣṇīṣa jvala jvala bandha bandha dama dama ṅra ṅra ṅra haḥ hana hūṃ jayoṣṇīṣamantrā ||
S08n671:34: tayaiva pradeśinyāgrā sañcārya madhyamadhyamasūcyā nakhasyopari tṛtīyabhāge śliṣṭā cakravartimudrā |
S08n671:35: oṃ namo apratihatatathāgatoṣṇīṣāya anavalokitamūrdhni cakravarti hūṃ jvala jvala dhaka dhaka dhuna dhuna vidhuna trāsaya mārayotsādaya hana hana aṃ aṃ aḥ aḥ kaḥ kaḥ proṃkhini proṃkhini kuṇḍalini aparojitāstradhāriṇi hū phaṭ |
S08n671:36: cakravarti tā eva pradeśinyāgrā sañcārya madhyamasūcyā nakhasyādhastāt tṛtīyabhāge saṃyuktā mantrādhipasya cakravarttine mudrā |
S08n671:37: tā eva pradeśinyāgrā sañcārya sūcyā nakhasyādhastāt saṃsaktā mantrādhipasya mudrā |
S08n671:38: tā eva pradeśinyāgrā sañcārya madhyamasūcyā nakhaparvayorantare saṃsaktā mahācakravarttine mudrā |
S08n671:39: tā eva pradeśinyāgrā sañcārya madhyamasūcya tṛtīye parve adhastāt saṃsaktā kuṇḍalākāreṇa mahācakravartine mudrā |
S08n671:40: tā eva pradeśinyāgrā sañcārya tṛtīye parve madhyamasūcyā parvayorantare saṃsaktā mantrādhipasya mahācakravartine mudrā |
S08n671:41: tā eva pradeśinyāgrā nirbhugnagulphasatrikaṃ madhyamasūcyā madhyamaparvayoradhastāt saṃsaktā parvatṛtīyena aparājitoṣṇīṣacakravarttina hṛdayamudrā |
S08n671:42: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om aparājitā dhik ||
S08n671:43: tā evoṣṇīṣamūlamudrāyānyatamena vā sopacāravinyāsa sarvakarmāṇi kārayedaṅguṣṭhāgraiścalitairanāmikā parāmṛjyotkarṣayedāvāhanam |
S08n671:44: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya ehi ehi bhagavaṃ ! dharmarāja ! pratīccheyaṃ ardhyaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ balyaṃ dīpaṃ ca |
S08n671:46: āvāhanaṃ śuklapuṣpaiḥ svarūpeṇārdhyapādyamācamanīyamāsanopaviśane tadānenaiva diśi vidiśi adha ūrdhvaṃ ca bandhayet ||
S08n671:51: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo'pratihatoṣṇīṣāya gaccha gaccha bhagavaṃ ! dharmarāja ! pratīccha mayārdhyaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ māṃ ca rakṣāpratihatabalaparākramāya |
S08n671:53: tā eva pradeśinyau adhastāt tṛtīye parve madhyamasūcye saṃsaktāvanyonya aṅguṣṭau saha kanyasaiḥ niḥpīḍitamuṣṭiḥ madhyamasūcyau |
S08n671:54: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya om om hrauṃ bandha hū phaṭ |
S08n671:57: tā eva pradeśinyau ākuñcitāgrā madhyamasūcyā tṛtīyaparve dīṣidasaṃsaktā vikaraṇoṣṇīṣamudrā |
S08n671:58: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya vikaraṇa dhuna dhuna hū vikaraṇoṣṇīṣaḥ bhagavato vidyādhipate mahāvidyārājā uṣṇīṣatantre sarvavighnavināyakopaghotaṣvabhiṣekamātmarakṣādiśābandhamaṇḍalabandhādiṣu sarvakarmeṣu prayujyate ||
S08n671:59: tā eva pradeśinyau vikasitākuñcitāgrā calitākṛṣṭau agnerāvāhanaṃ paścāddhomayāmīti |
S08n671:60: eṣa eva visarjanaṃ vikṣiptaiḥ pradeśinyau jvālāmālinyoṣṇīṣamudrā |
S08n671:62: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya ehyehi tejomāline agnaye svāhā ||
S08n671:63: tā eva pradeśinyau ākuñcitāgrā madhyamasūcyā tṛtīye parve madhyamaparvayorantare saṃsaktā balotkaṭoṣṇīṣamudrā |
S08n671:64: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya imaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ dīpaṃ ca pratīccha hara hara sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhite dharmarājāpratihatāya svāhā ||
S08n671:65: gandhādiṣu mantraḥ - viparyastānāmike tṛtīye tṛrvāṅguṣṭhe saṃsaktā pradeśinyaḥ sūcyākāraḥ vajratejoṣṇīṣamudrā |
S08n671:67: anena nigrahaṃ kuryāt sahāyānāṃ dikkālānāṃ ca |
S08n671:68: evamebhirmantramudraiḥ rakṣā japakāle sādhanakāle maṇḍale'pi sarvakarmāṇi kartavyāni |
S08n671:69: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya sarvavighnavidhvaṃsanakarāya troṭaya svāhā ||
S08n671:70: anāmikayoraṅguṣṭhamūle kuṇḍalākārastathaiva ca pradeśinyau sūcyākāraḥ sarvatrāpratihato'parājitoṣṇīṣamudrā |
S08n671:71: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya sarvatrāparājitāya samaye śānte dānte dharmarājabhāṣite mahāvidye sarvārthasādhani svāhā |
S08n671:73: etāvanāmikāyāḥ kuṇḍalayoḥ pradeśinyau kuñcitāgrā pratihateta śaṅkaroṣṇīṣamudrā |
S08n671:74: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣa oṃ śaṅkare svāhā |
S08n671:76: aṅguṣṭhāgrau anāmikayostṛtīye parvenākrāntā tathaiva pradeśinyau sūcyā vajrāpratihatasamayoṣṇīṣamudrā sarvatra samayasādhāraṇaḥ |
S08n671:77: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya |
S08n671:79: aṅguṣṭhāgrau anāmikayormadhye parveṇākrāntā pradeśinyau kuñcitāgrā madhyamasūcyā madhyamaparvasaṃsaktāpratihatamahāsamayoṣṇīṣamudrā devāsureṣu yujyate samaye sthāpitā |
S08n671:80: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavate apratihatoṣṇīṣāya om śaṅkare mahāsamayaṃ svāhā |
S08n671:81: anayā maṇḍalabandhaṃ kṛtvā japeccakravarttinamapi samaye tiṣṭha tiṣṭha |
S08n671:83: tatraiva sthāne japaṃ kurvaṃ sarvalaukikalokottarāṇāṃ gantrāṇāṃ asaktādanyonyaṃ vidyāprabhāvabalavighātaṃ karttum |
S08n671:87: iha hi mañjuśrīḥ kalparāje aparimāṇāni mantrāṇi bhavanti |
S08n671:90: yadi vistaraśo katheyam aśakyaṃ sarvamānuṣyaiḥ āmānuṣaiśca kalpasahasreṇāpi kālapramāṇenodgṛhītuṃ dhārayituṃ vā |
S08n671:91: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ saṃkṣepataḥ kathayiṣyāmi samāsenopadhāraya ||
S08n671:92: hṛdayasya mune mudrā kathyate pravarā iha |
S08n671:99: kiṅkaraḥ kiṅkarīṇāṃ ca piśāca piśācīnāṃ ca ||
S08n671:103: sarveṣāṃ tu jantūnāṃ mudrā hyuktā pṛthak pṛthak ||
S08n671:105: rājakule mānikule cāpi teṣāṃ mudrā pṛthak pṛthak ||
S08n671:120: eṣaiva dakṣiṇenāṅguṣṭhena ekaikadarśitena padmadharasya mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:121: vāmetarasya pūrvamuṣṭiṃ kṛtvā madhyamāṅguliyugalaṃ pramuñca prasṛtaṃ kṛtvaikataḥ vajrākāram |
S08n671:123: ekasūcīmavanāmya eṣā gandhahastine bodhisattvasya mudrā punarevotkṣipya maṇḍalākāraṃ kuryāt |
S08n671:127: sarveṣāṃ maṇicarāṇāṃ jambhale jalendrādīnāṃ mantraiḥ taireva yojayet |
S08n671:131: tathaiva hastau pūrvavat kārayitvā madhyamāṅguliyugalaṃ utthāya sūcikākāraṃ kārayitvā eṣā sarvadevānāṃ mudrā divyakule akaniṣṭhādīnāṃ divaukasām |
S08n671:132: bhūyastathaiva hastau saṃyamya muṣṭiṃ badhvā aṅguṣṭhau darśayet |
S08n671:137: sa eṣā kathitā mudrā bodhisattvāṃ mahīyasām ||
S08n671:142: dvau saptakau gaṇāvetau mudrā pañca mayā smṛtā |
S08n671:144: purā kathitā hyete mudrā ādijinaiḥ tadā |
S08n671:151: pātraṃ sampuṭādhāraḥ cīvaraṃ vāmahastena daṃṣṭrā hṛdayamudrāyā vāmamekamaṅguṣṭhamunnatam |
S08n671:152: abhayahastamabhayāvanataḥ vāmacīvarāvalambataḥ abhayahastaḥ sampuṭe madhyamāṅguliyugale tarjanyau bahiḥ kuñcitau niveśayet madhyāṅguṣṭhau |
S08n671:154: eṣaiva evā parvakuñcite tarjanī ekataḥ kuryād buddhamaitrī |
S08n671:155: añjali viralāṅguliṃ kṛtvā tarjanyanāmikā gopayet sūcītrayeṇa |
S08n671:157: añjaliṃ kṛtvā tarjanīmadhyamāṅgulibahiḥ tṛtīyaparve kuñcite sandadhyādaṅguṣṭhau pṛthak aṅgulyākāreṇa bhogavatīmudrā |
S08n671:160: evamevāṣṭau mahāmudrā ātmanā śirasi vidyārājamudrā badhvā sarvakarmāṇi kārayet |
S08n671:164: vidyāmantrābhihitāni samayāni bhavanti mudraiḥ samudritāni mudrāprabhāvāni |
S08n671:165: yanmudraṃ sahasā asthāne badhnīyāt sa evāsya samayabhaṅgo bhavati |
S08n671:170: madhye ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyāṃ sarveṣā ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ekāṅgulimucchrite sarveṣā manuṣyāṇāṃ dvipadacatuṣpadabahupadāpadavibhavasaṃsthitānāṃ sattvānāṃ mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:174: kṛtāñjalividhinyastau hastau śobhanākārasaṃsthitau sarveṣāṃ rūpādhacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:175: tadeva hastau ārupyādhacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:176: tadeva hastau suṣirasampuṭākārau muṣṭinibandhanau kāmadhātveśvaraprabhṛtīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāmadhātusthitānāṃ sanaratiryakpretayāmalaukikānāṃ sattvānāṃ mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:177: tāmeva mudrāmekamaṅgulimutsṛjya sarveṣāṃ piśācapiśācīnāṃ mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:179: trimutsṛtaiḥ sarvakravyādādīnāṃ grahamātarakūṣmāṇḍādīnāṃ piśitāśināṃ sarveṣāṃ ca ḍākinīnāṃ vyantarādīnāṃ ca sakaśmalāṃ caturbhiraṅgulībhiḥ saṅkucitaiḥ sarvakaśmalāṃ mudrā bhavati |
S08n671:182: ebhireva mudraiḥ yatheṣṭataḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ mantraṃ niyojayet |
S08n671:184: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ niyuñjyād yasmiṃ yasmiṃ mantrā bhavanti |
S08n671:186: aśaktā sarvasattvā vai mudrāṃ dṛṣṭvāpi kopitum ||
S08n671:188: mudrāṇāṃ vināśāt samayabhraṃśaḥ sarvavidyāvyatikramaśca niṣṭhāyāṃ raurave gatiḥ avīcyāyāṃ vā mahānarakopapattiḥ gāḍhataramevāpnuvanti vighnakartāro |
S08n671:189: ye ca mudrāsamayamadhitiṣṭhante teṣāṃ cirasaukhyamanalpakaṃ bhavati mahādivaukasopapattiśca gatiniṣṭhāyāṃ niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavati |
S08n671:190: saṃkṣepato mudrā bahuprakārā prakāśitā ādibuddhaiḥ bodhisattvaiśca maharddhikaiḥ |
S08n671:191: na śakyamasya paryantaṃ gantuṃ saṅkhyāgaṇanāṃ vā kartum |
S08n671:193: saṃkṣepataḥ jinakule vidyārājacakravarti ekamakṣaraṃ rakṣārthaṃ tasya mudrā bhavati ||
S08n671:194: vāmetarasya pūrvaṃ muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā madhyamāṅguliyugalaṃ pramuce prasṛtaṃ kṛtvaikataḥ |
S08n671:196: tarjanīyugalaṃ dviparva kuñcitaḥ anyonyanakhasaṃyuktaṃ aṅguṣṭhanakhopari dhārayet |
S08n671:197: eṣa cakravarttimudrā sarvakarmikā pravarā sarvamantrāṇāṃ nirdiṣṭā lokatāyibhiḥ |
S08n671:199: anena sādhitena sarvaṃ tathāgatakulaṃ sarvāśca laukikalokottarāḥ mantrāḥ siddhā bhavanti |
S08n671:201: anyadavaśyaṃ sādhakena pūrvataḥ asmiṃ kalparāje pracodite mantravare aṣṭasahasraṃ jāpaḥ kartavyaḥ |
S08n671:202: evamete sarvavidyāḥ āmukhībhavanti āśu siddhiṃ prayacchanti |
S08n671:204: niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇaḥ padmadharamudrāyāḥ ekākṣarāvalokiteśvarahṛdayena saṃyuktaḥ sarvakarmāṃ karoti |
S08n671:205: paṇḍaravāsinyā vā vidyāmudreṇa vā saṃyuktā tathaiva sarvakarmāṃ karoti |
S08n671:206: vajradharasya mudrayā tasyaiva ekākṣarahṛdayena saṃyuktaḥ tathaiva sarvakarmāṃ karoti |
S08n671:208: evaṃ rājakule ekākṣararājagandhabodhisattvahṛdayena evaṃ tenaiva mudrayā maṇikule yakṣakule divye ārye teṣviha ekākṣarahṛdayaiḥ teṣveva mudraiḥ sarvakarmāṇi kartavyāni |
S08n671:209: evaṃ sarvatra sarvamudraiḥ sarvamantraiśca sarvakarmāṇi kartavyāni |
S08n671:212: evaṃ dakṣiṇakaravinyastaṃ svastyodyataḥ brāhmaṇasya sahāmpateḥ ekaliṅgamudrāyā maheśvarasya cakramudrāyā viṣṇoḥ añjalirākośaviralavinyastaḥ garutmanaḥ evaṃ ṛṣīṇāṃ śāpodyatahastamudraṃ evaṃ gandharvāṇāṃ sasurāsurāṇāṃ vāmahastamaṅguṣṭhasabhyantarīkṛtamukhamupadarśanamaṣṭisthitaṃ catuḥkumāryamudrā tenaiva mantreṇa evaṃ kārtikeyasya śaktimudrayā evaṃ yamavaruṇakuberayakṣarākṣasapiśācamahoragādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ tribhavasaṃsthitānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvagatiparyāpannānāṃ sattvadhātusanniḥśritānāṃ sarveṣāṃ grahamātarakravyādakaśmalādīnāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvataḥ sarveṣāṃ mudrānyuktāni |
S08n671:213: mantrāścaiva sarvataḥ niyujyānupūrvaśaḥ kramaśaḥ sarvataḥ sarvaṃ bhavati nānyataḥ ||
S08n671:214: ādau tāvat sādhakena asmin kalparāje tathāgatagatiḥ śubhā mahāmudrā mantrāśca tadaṅgā niśritā āryasamantabhadramahāsthānaprāptavimalagateḥ tvadīyā mañjuśrī utpalamudrā eteṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ca mudrā avaśyaṃ sādhakena pūrvābhimukhasthitena ādityābhimukhena prātarutthāya śucinā śucisthānasthitena eteṣāṃ mudrāṇāmanyataraṃ badhvā ātmaśirasyopari kṣipedūrdhvam |
S08n671:224: katamā ca te mudrā mantrāśca bhavanti ||
S08n671:226: hastadvaya sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā antaritāṅgulimaṅguṣṭhamunnatau parvatṛtīyabhāgākuñcitau eṣā mahāvīramudrā sarvatathāgatairbhāṣitā |
S08n671:227: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - āḥ vīraṃ hūṃ khaṃ |
S08n671:229: tadeva hastadvayaṃ sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo vikasitamaṅgulībhiḥ samantato vikasitāṃ vajrākāram eṣā vikāsinī nāma mudrā varā ādibuddhaiḥ prakāśitā |
S08n671:230: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om gaganasambhave dīpta dīpta jvālaya jvālaya buddhādhiṣṭhite vikāśaya vikāśaya sarvabuddhān |
S08n671:231: hūṃ hūṃ vikāsini phaṭ phaṭ svāhā |
S08n671:235: jalpāpayati grahagṛhītāṃ kravyādakaśmalagṛhītānāṃ viṣamūrchitānāṃ vā yathā yathā prayujyate,
S08n671:237: eṣa saṃkṣepataḥ sarvārthasaṃsādhanī vidyāvikāsinyā mudrayā yuktā asiddhā ca kṣipramarthaṃ karoti |
S08n671:238: hastadvaya sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā antaritāṅgulisamaṃ kārayad hṛdayamudrā |
S08n671:241: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om godare vīra svāhā |
S08n671:244: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om dro bandha svāhā |
S08n671:247: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om dhunājitaraṇa hū |
S08n671:249: anenaiva mudrayā saṃyukta vāmaṃ cīvarasaṃsaktaṃ kṛtvā cīvaramudrā |
S08n671:250: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om rakṣa rakṣa sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhitātmacīvara svāhā |
S08n671:258: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om lokapālādhiṣṭhita dhara dhāraya mahānubhāva buddhapātra svāhā |
S08n671:259: anenaiva mudreṇāyaṃ mantraḥ saṃyuktā sarvakarmikāḥ bhojanakāle smartavyaḥ |
S08n671:263: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om tejo jvala sarvārthasādhaka sidhya sidhya cintāmaṇiratna hū |
S08n671:266: anena cābhimantrya sarvābharaṇālaṅkāraviśeṣāṃ ābandhīta cātmano mahārakṣā kṛtā bhavati |
S08n671:268: svayamalaṅkṛtya dharmaṃ cābhimantrya saṅgrāmamavatarenna cāsya kāye śastraṃ nipatati |
S08n671:272: evamādīni karmāṇi aparimāṇāni asiddha eva karoti |
S08n671:273: padmarāgamarakatādīnāmanyatama ratnaviśeṣaṃ gṛhītvā aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā dhvajāgre ātmano śirasi vā hastiskandhe vā śaṅgrāmaśīrṣeṇāvatīrṇonābandhayitavyam |
S08n671:277: anyonyāsaktāṅgulimuṣṭiṃ kṛtvā madhyamāṅgulisthāne tayostṛtīyaparvabhāge madhyakuñcite tarjanyonya sa eṣā dharmacakramudrā |
S08n671:278: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om chinda bhinda hana daha dīpta cakra hū |
S08n671:280: vāmapādamuktaṭkadakṣiṇajānubhūmisthaṃ vāmena pṛṣṭhataḥ prasārite prahārahastena dakṣiṇenāhuṅkṛtena sāvaṣṭambhaḥ |
S08n671:282: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om hulu hulu caṇḍāli mātaṅgi svāhā |
S08n671:286: yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā sarvakarmāṇi kurvanti ||
S08n671:287: veṇyotsaṅge tathaiva hastaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena dharmadeśanāhastena tathāgataśaktimudrā bhavati |
S08n671:288: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om vijaye mahāśakti durdhari hū phaṭ vijayini phaṭ maṅgale phaṭ |
S08n671:292: eṣā aparyantaguṇā yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā sarvakarmāṇi karoti ||
S08n671:293: tathaiva hastau parasparāṅguliruttānau karau tarjanyāgrau sūcyākāreṇa mīlitau viparyastamadhomukhaṃ lalāṭe nyaset |
S08n671:295: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namaḥ sarvatathāgatebhyo'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksambuddhebhyaḥ |
S08n671:296: he he bandha bandha tiṣṭha tiṣṭha dhāraya dhāraya nirundha nirundha ūrṇāmaṇi svāhā |
S08n671:299: gorocanayā lalāṭe tilakaṃ kṛtvā japatā śatrumadhye'vataret |
S08n671:308: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om ru ru sphuru jvala tiṣṭha siddhalocane sarvārthasādhani svāhā |
S08n671:309: eṣā tathāgatalocanā mantrā anenaiva mudreṇa saṃyuktā sarvakarmikā bhavati |
S08n671:314: saṅgrāmaśīrṣo vā akṣiṇī mabhimantrya parasenāṃ nirīkṣayet saumyacittā bhavanti |
S08n671:317: ubhau hastau tathaiva pustakākārāṅguliracitau anyonyāgrāśliṣṭau tiryak sthitau |
S08n671:319: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - namo bhagavati cārudarśane om tha |
S08n671:320: eṣā bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā anenaiva mudreṇa saṃyuktā sarvakarmikā bhavati |
S08n671:321: mantraṃ japatā hṛdayaṃ parāmṛśet smṛtimāṃ bhavati |
S08n671:323: saṅgrāmamadhye vā dvipadacatuṣpadādīṃ sattvāṃ pratyarthikāṃ vimohayati |
S08n671:325: eṣā bhagavatī yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā sarvakarmāṇi karoti |
S08n671:326: saṃkṣepataḥ aparyantaguṇā aparyantaṃ cāsya kalpaṃ bhavati |
S08n671:328: yathā sannipātaparivartī coktaṃ tathāgatānāṃ parivārāḥ te'tra sarve mudrā mantrāśca prayoktavyā |
S08n671:332: mantraṃ bhavati - om jiḥ jiḥ jināṅgabhṛdbhayabhedine svāhā |
S08n671:333: eṣa mantra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya padmamudrayā saṃyuktaṃ sarvakarmikaṃ bhavati |
S08n671:334: anena japtena sarvaṃ padmakulaṃ japtaṃ bhavati |
S08n671:335: anena siddhena sarvaṃ padmakulaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati |
S08n671:337: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om kaṭe vikaṭe nikaṭe kaṭaṅkaṭe kaṭavikaṭakaṭaṅkaṭe svāhā |
S08n671:338: mudreṇaiva yojayet padmamudreṇa vā sarvakarmikā bhavati |
S08n671:340: evaṃ tārā bhrukuṭī candrā hayagrīvasyeti vidyārājasannipātaparivarte vā ye kathitāḥ sarvamasaṅkhyaṃ cā padmakulaṃ prayoktavyam mudrā mantraiśca kalpavistaraiḥ ||
S08n671:343: eṣa vajrapāṇeḥ sākṣādanena sādhitena sarvaṃ vajrakulaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati |
S08n671:347: atikrūrataro'yaṃ mahāyakṣaṃ māmakyā vā kulandharyā mahāvidyāyāḥ sarvakarmāṇi karoti |
S08n671:348: mantraṃ cātra bhavati - om kulandhari bandha bandha huṃ phaṭ |
S08n671:349: eṣā sarvakarmikā māmakī nāma mahāvidyā sarvabuddhairnirdiṣṭā pūrvaprayuktena mudreṇa māmakyāyā mahāvidyayā saṃyuktā sarvakarmikā bhavati |
S08n671:350: sādhakecchāyā nidānaparivarti pūrvanirdiṣṭe vajrapāṇiparivāreṇa sarvaṃ vāśeṣaṃ vajrikulaṃ mudrāmantramantrasaṃyogaiścātra prayoktavyam ||
S08n671:351: evaṃ rājakule gajagandhasya bodhisattvasya mantraṃ bhavati - om gajāhvaye hū khacare svāhā |
S08n671:353: evaṃ pūrvavat sarvaṃ gajakulaḥ siddho bhavati ||
S08n671:354: evaṃ samantabhadrasya mantraḥ - om samāsamajinasuta mā vilamba hū phaṭ ||
S08n671:355: mahāsthānaprāptasya mantraḥ - tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahāsthāne gatabodhaḥ samayamanusmara hū phaṭ phaṭ svāhā ||
S08n671:356: vimalagate mantraḥ - om vimale vimale vimala muhūrtaṃ dhaka dhaka samayamanusmara svāhā ||
S08n671:357: gaganagañjasya mantraḥ sarvabodhisattvasya mudrasaṃyuktaḥ sarvakarmiko bhavati |
S08n671:360: savistaratā sarvalaukikalokottarottaratā sarvalaukikāśca sarvamantramudrākalpavistaro mahāsamayāsamayamanupraviṣṭā sarvakalpavikalpā ta iha kathitāni sādhyāśca te iha sarvamantrāḥ ||
S08n671:362: sarvatantramantramudrāśca tryadhvāśritā eka eva kulaṃ bhavati nānyaṃ yaduta tathāgatakulam |
S08n671:363: tvaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ ! kumāra ! tathāgatakule draṣṭavyaḥ |
S08n671:364: sarvabuddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ sarvāśca laukikalokottarāḥ sāśravānāśravamantrā mudrāvikalpāstathāgatakulāni praviṣṭā iti dhāraya |
S08n671:365: na tad vidyate mañjuśrīḥ ! sarvavimudrātantramantrarahasyaṃ yastathāgatakule tathāgatasamaye anupraviṣṭaḥ |
S08n671:367: yasmāt tathāgata agramākhyāyate tasmāt tathāgatakulaṃ agramākhyāyate |
S08n671:368: evaṃ tarhi mañjuśrīḥ ! ayaṃ kalparājā ayaṃ ca kulāgraratnaḥ ādimadbhirbuddhaiḥ prakāśitaṃ deśitaṃ prasthāpitaṃ vivṛṇvīkṛtam bhagavāṃ saṃkusumitarājena bhagavatā śālarājendreṇa bhagavatā saṅkusumitagandhottamarājena bhagavatā ratnaketunā bhagavatā amitābhena bhagavatā puṇyābhena kusumottamena saṅkusumena supuṣpeṇa amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendreṇa kanakamuninā kāśyapena krakutsandena śikhināviśvabhuvā bhagavatā konākamuninā |
S08n671:370: evametad buddhaparamparāyātaṃ ayaṃ tava mañjuśrīḥ ! kumāra ! kalparājā tathāgatakulāgraratnabhūtaṃ mahānuśaṃsaṃ niyataṃ dharmadhātuniśritaṃ na śakyamasyānuśaṃsaṃ kalpasahasreṇāpi kathayituṃ mahāguṇavistārā vistaraśaḥ kathayitum |
S08n671:373: yaḥ kaścit śrāddhe avicikitsaḥ dhārayed vācaye smiṃ tantre'bhiyukto vikalpataḥ mantraṃ sādhaye japed vāpi mudrāṃ vāpi badhnīyāt satatābhiyuktaśca bhavet |
S08n671:374: sa dṛṣṭa eva dharmairaṣṭau guṇānuśaṃsāṃ pratilabhate |
S08n671:382: rātrau vāsya pratyayaṃ svapne darśanaṃ dadāti |
S08n671:388: gṛheṇo vā pravrajitasya vā striyasya vā puruṣasya vā mahāsattvānāṃ śāsanopakāriṇām |
S08n671:392: mañjuśriyaḥ kumāra ! tvadīyamudrāmantrairvā tulyavīryā hyete tulyaprabhāvā |
S08n671:394: sthānaṃ madhyaṃ bhūpradeśaṃ aśalyoparuddhaṃ apatitagomayopaliptaṃ sugandhaśuklapuṣpābhikīrṇam |
S08n671:398: yaduktaṃ śucineti astaṃ gate bhānoḥ snāyīta śucinā jalena niḥprāṇakena
S08n671:403: kanyākartitasutreṇa brāhmaṇyā vā aratisambhavāyā gṛhītvā aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā anena mantreṇa - om hara hara bandha bandha śukradhāraṇi siddhārthe svāhā - māmakyayā mudrāsaṃyuktā mantraṃ japet |
S08n671:408: vidhinā nāvidhinā sarāgasya na vītarāgasya kāmadhātveśvarasyāpi ṛṣiṇo duhitaraśca aśaktā manovighātamutpādayituṃ vividharūpadhāriṇyaḥ rāgiṇām |
S08n671:410: evaṃ vidhinā prātarutthāya visarjya dantadhāvana mukhaṃ prakṣālya śucinā jalena snātvā niṣprāṇake vimalodakena pūrvavad vidhinā pūrvābhimukhasthitena mudrāṃ bandhīyāt |
S08n671:421: mayāpyetarhi śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena bhāṣito mahatā parṣanmaṇḍalamadhye |
S08n671:422: nvamapi kumāra ! mañjuśrīḥ ! sanniyukto'yaṃ śāsanaparisaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ dharmadhātucirasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ ca mayi parinirvṛte dharmakoṭiniśrite bhūtakoṭiparyavasāne śāntībhūte mahākaruṇāvarjitamānasena sattvānāṃ hitārthāya bhāṣito'yaṃ mayā yugānte mahābhairave kāle vartamāne ratnatrayāpakāriṇāṃ duṣṭarājñāṃ duṣṭasattvānāṃ ca nivāraṇārthāya vinayanārthāya ca bhāṣito'yaṃ kalparājā vistaravibhāgaśaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāyeti ||
